attributes.action: Complain against lottery scam through mobile/sms/email
attributes.additional_details: I am an unemployed pauper  with zero bank balance from India. I think that I'm getting cheated in one of the lottery scam through sms. Since many of the these scam mails are from England, I want to raise this issue to you seriously; even when I have told the concerned parties that I'm a pauper, why did they exploit me financially? I'm sorry to ask this, is this a racial hatred or impression? Sorry once again.......I apologize to you. Please do the needful.

rejection.details:
There are many scam lotteries operating at the moment and we urge you to be very cautious about responding to any notification that claims you have won a lottery that you have not entered.

If you have not entered a lottery you cannot win one.  In this country, all legal lotteries require the purchase of a ticket (paper or electronic) with certain information about the lottery to be printed/displayed on it.
